name: Convert
tagline: CONcrete Visual assisstEt Transformation Framework (CONVErT) is a framework for performing model transformations and data mappings using visual notations.
body:
CONcrete Visual assistEd Transformation framework (CONVErT) is designed to provide a user-centric approach to generating visualisations and using them in model transformation applications.
